font.marquee: --COVID19 School will be continuous learning online for rest of 2020-

h3.a: Seven CAM FFA Members Achieve Their Iowa Degree

div.p: The Iowa FFA Degree is the highest degree the state can bestow upon a member. FFA members who qualify, have met minimum involvement requirements in all components of the three-circle model: SAE, FFA and Classroom/Laboratory. It is awarded at the State Convention. The State Degree recipients earn a charm that can be worn on the official jacket or on a gold chain. This year the CAM FFA had seven members qualify for their State FFA degree. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Seven CAM FFA Members Achieve Their Iowa Degree

div.p: The CAM District is serving 325 students in the lunch program. On Mondays, we pack meals for three days, which is six meals, and then on Thursdays, we pack meals for two days, which is four meals, for breakfast and lunch. We are also serving a hot lunch on the day we give the meals to the students. During the week of March 30 - April 3rd, we are serving around 1600 meals with six cooks and three principals helping on the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about CAM Lunch Program

div.p: Cheri Chester will start taking pictures of you in your uniform and any other equipment you would like to use; such as a baseball, softball, glove, bat, gun for shooting sports, golf club, etc. to send to the CAM Digital Network to create a banner in Photoshop for your spring/summer sports. She would like to start taking pictures during the week of April 20th, so you will need to get signed up for a . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Attention CAM Track/Golf/Softball/Baseball/Shooting Sports Seniors

div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 14:55 pm CDT

div.span: Sunny, with a high near 68. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

Scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Sunny, with a high near 77. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
